entries.title: Apple Removes Decentralized Twitter-Like App Damus From Chinese App Store
entries.description: Customers shop at apple's flagship store for smart products on Nanjing Road pedestrian street in Shanghai, China, Feb. 23, 2022. (Costfoto/Future Publishing via Getty Images)

entries.title: India Issues Order Banning Over 200 Gambling and Loan Apps, Most With Links to China: Reports
entries.description: Members of the City Youth Organisation hold posters with the logos of Chinese apps in support of the Indian government for banning the wildly popular video-sharing TikTok app, in Hyderabad, India, on June 30, 2020. India banned another 54 Chinese apps in Feburary 2022. (Noah Seelam/AFP via Getty Images)

entries.title: Ransomware Attacks in Europe Target Known Server Vulnerability, Cybersecurity Agencies Warn
entries.description: A hooded man holds a laptop computer as cyber code is projected on him in this illustration picture taken on May 13, 2017. (Kacper Pempel/Illustration/Reuters)
